reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that they collect information in multiple ways, including directly from users, passively from browsers or devices, and from third parties.
reply.reference: We collect information in multiple ways, including when you provide information directly to us; when we passively collect information from you, such as from your browser or device; and from third parties. URL: https://www.merago.com/privacy-policy

Last Updated: May 10, 2025
This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) explains the information collection, use, and sharing practices of MERAGO Inc. and its subsidiaries (referred to as “we,” “us,” and “our” in this policy).
Unless otherwise stated, this Policy describes and governs the information collection, use, and sharing practices of MERAGO Inc with respect to your use of our website (www.merago.com) or our mobile applications and the services (“Services”) we provide.

To the extent those laws apply, our legal grounds for processing such information are as follows.

To honor our contractual commitments to you.

All data access is limited only to medical personnel authorized to provide care and healthcare related support to clients / patients / users.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects a variety of data types including name, contact information, demographic information, information about an individual’s employer, information to verify identity or trustworthiness, and information for other fraud or safety protection purposes.

content: Information to verify identity or trustworthiness
Information for other fraud or safety protection purposes

reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies that the app collects various types of data from third parties which include personal information, demographic data, employer information, and data for safety purposes. This data is collected for a range of purposes mentioned in the privacy policy.
reply.reference: The app collects a variety of data types including name, contact information, demographic information, information about an individual’s employer, information to verify identity or trustworthiness, and information for other fraud or safety protection purposes. URL: https://www.merago.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the purposes for which the app collects and uses data, including fulfilling user-provided purposes, providing and improving services, fundraising, sending notifications, processing inquiries, conducting analytics, complying with the law, protecting safety and enforcing terms of use.

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that users can opt out of data collection through methods such as unsubscribing from marketing emails or adjusting account preferences.
reply.reference: You may unsubscribe from our marketing emails at any time by clicking on the 'unsubscribe' link at the bottom of each newsletter or by emailing unsubscribe@merago.com with your request. If you have registered for an account with us through our services, you can update your account information or adjust your email communications preferences by logging into your account and updating your settings. URL: https://www.merago.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app may disclose and/or share user information with third parties, including advertisers, promotional partners, and others, thus indicating data sharing with third parties.
reply.reference: We may disclose and/or share your information under the following circumstances ... We may disclose de-identified and/or aggregated data for any purpose to third parties, including advertisers, promotional partners, and/or others. URL: https://www.merago.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with third parties, including service providers, legal compliance partners, affiliated companies, and others such as advertisers and promotional partners.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy indicates that the app shares data with various categories of third parties for different purposes, which are explicitly mentioned throughout the document.
reply.reference: Service Providers. We may disclose your information with third parties who perform services on our behalf... Legal Compliance and Disclosure of Information.
